children.text:
There is nothing worse than finding yourself without heating when you need it the most. A lot of us don’t even think of having our boiler serviced or how important it is until something goes wrong. This is why an annual boiler service should be in everyone's diaries each year a lot like having your car serviced.

By having your boiler serviced we can not only check for any problems we also check for any leaks or any other issues that could prevent your system or boiler from failing when you most need it. If a fault is detected, planned maintenance is normally cheaper than an emergency call out.

If you're on our register then you don’t need to add it to your diaries as we will send you a reminder yearly.

We service a wide range of appliances so please feel free to contact us.

images.title: The inside of a domestic boiler

children.text:
Property maintenance is a broad service. We can do the small jobs from a minor repair to a complete bathroom or kitchen.

So while we are at your property servicing your boiler or carrying out a landlord's gas safety certificate (CP12) and you decide you want to get a door adjusted, change a plug socket and/or light switch we are always on hand to either help or offer our best advice.

We do charge for additional services.

Feel free to ask any questions.

Gas is quite simple really if it is in your house it is generally used for heating and cooking but you need to make sure it is safe and tested. You may be having a new kitchen installed and need the gas pipe to the cooker or hob relocated, you may need to run a new supply to an appliance or you may need a trace and repair for a leak (hopefully not).

Either way with gas its better to be safe than sorry and whatever you have done make sure an engineer is gas safe registered.

In all cases, if you smell gas turn it off at the meter and call an engineer and if they can't come then call the national gas emergency line

Power Flushing is a cleaning process to help remove any rust or debris from your central heating system, this will then help your radiators heat up quicker, make your system more reliable, and making this more energy efficient.
Radiator nice and warm at the top and cold at the bottom?
You may have a sludge issue.
Note
You will want to get the central heating pump checked first, either way, further investigation would be advisable.
Tip:

if your radiators are cold at the top it’s usually just air, which can be bled.

Most manufacturers recommend getting your heating system flushed when you replace your boiler, even more so if you are converting from an old tank system to a sealed system.

Call us for a free no-obligation quotation.

images.title: Power flushing machine flushing out a toilet
Black liquid substance as a result of power flushing
Post power flush, clean water flowing

children.text:
Plumbing can range from a blocked drain to a broken tap washer, there are a vast number of jobs that require plumbing.

• Toilets and Saniflow
• Stop cocks and ball valves
• Waste disposal units
• Waste pipes
• Drainage
• Tap washers

and the list goes on...

We also offer a best advice service for future projects.

At SW Heating Ltd we generally use Vaillant as the preferred brand as they have years of proven reliability and efficiency, recommended by WHICH magazine to name one from the long list of recommendations.

Vaillant offers quite long warranties on their products and I think that speaks for itself. So if you are having a new combination boiler, new system boiler, or a heat-only boiler we personally recommend Vaillant although we will install any brand of boiler if requested.

So whether you are converting from an old tank system to a combination boiler, or you are upgrading to an unvented cylinder and a system boiler, or maybe you like your old copper cylinder and just want a heat-only boiler to work like your old one we offer very competitive rates.
Note:

Remember that whatever boiler you want installing, whether it be a cheap boiler or a more expensive boiler the labour charge is the same. It is only the quality of the appliances that alters the price.

images.title: The inside of a domestic boiler

children.text: Who likes to walk into a cold home or switch on the shower and the water isn’t hot? As in our mission statement our aim at SW Heating is to keep your taps running and your house warm.
Heating

The majority of households have either radiators or underfloor heating as there main source of heating. When it goes wrong a cold house is a pretty unpleasant place to be. Whether its service repair or installation, you can rely on us to get any heating system back working.
Hot Water

Whether you have a conventional system with a copper cylinder and boiler, an unvented hot water tank and sealed system or you may just have a directly heated tank in an all-electric property. We service, repair, and install most brands.

If you are looking to refurbish or update your bathroom we offer a bespoke design and installation service. There is no need for you to worry about plumbers, electricians, plasterers etc we can take care of it all.

If you are looking for a traditional bathroom, wet room, or ensuite we will ensure that the look and feel meets all of your needs. This could be somewhere that you can relax after a hard day's work, somewhere the children can have fun splashing around or just to jump in the shower before heading out.

Landlords if you want a standard rental specification bathroom or maybe you just need a silicon change ready for new tenants.

There really is no limitation to our bathroom services.
